title: Upgrade Clover to 2.5.1
description:
Lucene is currently using Clover1. I will attach a patch and a new Clover2 license to this issue shortly to enable Clover2 for Lucene.

See also email discussion here: http://lucene.markmail.org/message/xkmyje4wgvnl74xe#query:+page:1+mid:3yq4grt5iyis2f5r+state:results
